alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cleveland and northwestern Pottawatomie Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 829 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oklahoma City to near Etowah. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastern Norman, Shawnee, Tecumseh, Pink, Tribbey, Etowah, Brooksville, Macomb, Stella, Lake Thunderbird, Bethel Acres, and Little Axe. This includes Interstate 40 near mile marker 179, and between mile markers 183 and 185. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
